    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030914</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sistemas de transporte</string>
            <string language="en">Transport systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transportsysteme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Systèmes de transport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistemas do transporte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemi di trasporto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συστήματα μεταφορών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica el concepto y la necesidad del medio interno, así como los tipos de medios internos existentes. Se analizan los tipos de sistemas de transporte en animales y se estudia el sistema circulatorio en humanos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the concept and the need for an internal environment, as well as the types of internal environments which exist. The types of transport systems are analysed in animals and the circulatory system is studied in humans.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Transporte</string>
            <string language="en">Transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches das Konzept und die Notwendigkeit 
an einer internen Umgebung, sowie die Typen der internen Umgebungen 
erklärt, die existieren. Die Typen der Transportsysteme werden 
in den Tieren analysiert und das zirkulierende System wird in den 
Menschen studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant le concept et le besoin 
d'environnement interne, aussi bien que les types d'environnements 
internes qui existent. Les types de systèmes de transport sont 
analysés chez les animaux et le système circulatoire est étudié 
chez l'homme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica o conceito e a necessidade 
para um ambiente interno, as.well.as os tipos de ambientes internos 
que existem. Os tipos de sistemas do transporte são analisados 
nos animais e o sistema circulatório é estudado nos seres humanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega il concetto e l'esigenza di 
un ambiente interno, così come i tipi di ambienti interni che 
esistono. I tipi di sistemi di trasporto sono analizzati in 
animali ed il sistema circolatorio è studiato in esseri umani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγούν την έννοια και την ανάγκη για ένα 
εσωτερικό περιβάλλον, καθώς επίσης και οι τύποι εσωτερικών 
περιβαλλόντων που υπάρχουν. Οι τύποι συστημάτων μεταφορών 
αναλύονται στα ζώα και το κυκλοφοριακό σύστημα μελετάται στους 
ανθρώπους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierkönigreich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
